div.div:
All ratings (Avg rating: 5)
100%
0%
0%
0%
0%

by a parent
Friday, July 27, 2018
We have been with Legacy since our eldest was in Kindergarten. He is now going into 6th grade and our youngest is going into 4th. We have had nothing but positive experiences every single year with teachers, staff, the education our children are receiving and extracurriculars. We love that Legacy isn't just a school our kids attend, it really is a community. There is so much care that comes from the teachers and from the administration. We love that our kids are receiving a quality education that is preparing them for success in the future. But most importantly, our kids LOVE this school and look forward to going! They love their teachers, they love their principal, they love being involved in all the fun activities the school plans for them. We love that parents are encouraged to be involved with volunteering and are always welcomed. Choosing Legacy 7 years ago is one of the best decisions we have ever made for our family.

h2.span: Student/Teacher Ratio Legacy Traditional School - Northwest Tucson

table.class: table table-condensed table-striped table-bordered table-hover dt-responsive

br.span: Data source: National Center for Education Statistics, U.S. Dept of Education.

span.span: Student/teacher ratio is calculated by dividing the total number of students by the total number of full-time equivalent teachers. Please note that a smaller student/teacher ratio does not necessarily translate to smaller class size. In some instances, schools hire teachers part time, and some teachers are hired for specialized instruction with very small class sizes. These and other factors contribute to the student/teacher ratio. Note: For private schools, Student/teacher ratio may not include Pre-Kindergarten.
